metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39197 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: [netfilter: conntrack: dccp: copy entire header to stack buffer, not just basic one]

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> probably also known as ZDI-CAN-21202 commit message has a note that dccp contract support might get removed at some point in a near future (not removed as of 2023-11-10)

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-allwinner: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life').
linux-aws package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
